event-group.description: Controls loading progress / goals for each level
event-group.title: ProgressLoader

sub-events.comment: Make Sure level 1 is always unlocked
Lock level if no progress found
Set the star levels in save
Revise the star point levels if they dont match the variables
Set scroll position if avaliable on start, else create a local webstorage variable

event-group.description: Controls the window for loading a level
event-group.title: LevelWindow
